creditline: Museum purchase, gift of Mr. and Mrs. James E. Burke, with matching funds from IBM Corporation, Johnson & Johnson, and the Prudential Foundation
markings: Watermark: Transverse S (Briquet 9075) and coat of arms (Hollstein 290)
inscribed:
Numbered in margin, lower left: 7.

Two lines of Latin in margin, lower center: Exc[a]ecat Diuin[a]e aciem ..., humo c[a]enoq[ue] moratur.  F.E.

Signed in niche, lower right: HG Inue
